revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Ten Carat Hill |image = [[File:Ten Carat Hill.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ten Carat Hill. |tokens = 835,000 |location = West of Melemele Sea }}
<!--T:2--> '''Ten Carat Hill''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 11,897,821 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! <!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Spinda.png|50px]] Spinda ||rowspan=3|<center>59,489,105 ||rowspan=3 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Carbink.png|50px]] Carbink |- | [[File:Rockruff.png|50px]] Rockruff |- |}
